book.synopsis: Stanley wishes he were a dinosaur so that his big brother, Lionel, would pay attention to him. But when Stanley actually becomes a T.rex, the mightiest of the dinosaurs, he realizes that is is much better to be loved than feared.
book.dimensions: Height: 8 Inches, Length: 8 Inches, Weight: 0.15 Pounds, Width: 0.125 Inches
